meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Tritoma, also known as a red hot poker.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the tritomas added a splash of color with their vibrant red flowers.
meanings.sent2: The tritomas in the flower bed attracted hummingbirds with their bright blooms.
meanings.sent3: The tritomas in the yard seemed to be playing a game of hide-and-seek with the bees.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the garden like the cheerful tritomas in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The tritomas stood tall like fiery torches lighting up the greenery.

meanings.definition: A perennial plant with long, narrow leaves and tall spikes of tubular flowers.
meanings.sent1: The tritomas swayed gracefully in the breeze, their tubular flowers dancing.
meanings.sent2: Gardening enthusiasts love to grow tritomas for their unique tubular blooms.
meanings.sent3: The tritomas whispered secrets to the neighboring plants with their tubular flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a jungle of colors, with tritomas standing out like exotic trumpets.
meanings.sent5: The tritomas stood proudly, their tubular flowers a beacon of beauty in the garden.
